summary: Completed Phase 1 audit: All migrations (32), entities (19), services (10), policies (3), and seeders are in place and follow standards. Admin and vendor sidebars are complete. Routes are properly configured. Moving to complete admin web CRUD controllers and views.
current_status: Phase 1 (Groundwork) complete. Phase 2 (Admin Web) in progress. Most infrastructure exists; systematically completing missing pieces.
